metadata.name: The Red Village Blood Portal
metadata.description:
The Blood Portal is a sacred artifact that holds the power to transport elements of The Red Village universe into the outside world. Imbued with strong and sinister powers, these ancient demonic portals will give their owners special access utility within The Red Village ecosystem such as:

Cherish this token, it will forever be the first token from The Red Village and will grant its owner privileges in perpetuity.
